name: Suspicious Hell
description:
An extremely fast paced retro "90s-like" shooter, in Among Us Hell you are a Marine, sent on a mission to Hell to exterminate EVERY SPECIES. Do not let the Among Us take over the world.

This game features numerous different enemies, as well as weapon upgrades, and highly thought out levels. The game has been made to be difficult. There has been great inspiration taken from games such as DOOM and QUAKE, although much effort has been put in - therefore leaving you with the GREATEST VIDEO GAME OF ALL TIME:

AMONG US HELL

Although we are being a bit silly, this is genuinely an incredibly well made game, that is sure to be enganging and keep you fighting for a long time. We hope you enjoy, and feel free to rate.
